Text: Jackie Guerra:  She also co-starred in the PBS series, "American Family" in addition to co-starring roles in feature films, including a role as Jennifer Lopez’s drum playing sister Suzette Quintanilla in the Warner Bros. biopic "Selena" and opposite Woody Allen in "Picking Up the Pieces".
